NAME: Slime
DESC: A small  amorphous blob of varying color. Weak all around.

NAME: Rat
DESC: The usual rodent. Quicker than average but rather weak to spells.

NAME: Bat
DESC: Poor eyesight though echolocation makes up for that. Decent with magic.

NAME: Spider
DESC: Lots of legs and webbing. Adept at skittering and climbing.

NAME: Worm
DESC: Wriggly little bug. Not very bright and can't perceive the world well.

NAME: Ant
DESC: Really quite strong for its size. Small and squishy.

NAME: Snake
DESC: Uses its tongue to taste the air, good all around.

NAME: Beetle
DESC: Not as strong as an ant, but much more hardy.
